keyMoments.description: The Centaur Patrol Unit attacks the Straw Hats at the frozen lake on Punk Hazard
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Caesar's security forces composed of human-animal hybrid experiments

formation.circumstances: Created by Caesar Clown from pirates who were crippled and transformed into centaur hybrids using Law's surgical abilities

goals: Prevent intruders from entering the facility

reveals.information: A patrol unit composed of human-animal centaur hybrids created through experiments
Led by former pirate captain Brownbeard who was transformed after being defeated
